attributes.action: Ministers obligations regarding the provision of personal information
attributes.additional_details:
Ministers personal circumstances might impact on their judgements and the public have a right to know.

This petition requires all Ministers (at whatever level) and all their opposition shadows to declare the following -

1-This applies to every Minister and their equivalent shadow - an annual declaration of the value of personal assets and the previous year's annual income from all sources

2 - This applies to all Ministers in the Education Department and their equivalent shadow - an annual declaration of the type of schooling being experienced by their children if they have any of the appropriate ages

3 - This applies to all Ministers in Health Departments and their equivalent shadows - an annual declaration of whether or not they subscribe to private health insurance plans for them and their family
